title: Uhh, Rito pls
body:
Soo, my friend and I were duoing and our game didnt load. It constantly crashed and said we couldn't connect to the server. So we just talked for 15 min or so. After that we decided to try again, and when we came back our base was destroyed. This also happened to our entire team, but did not effect the enemies. We still lost LP. 

Looking for an answer to this madness...

replies.body:
Could legitimately be that all your team-mates just happened to disconnect because of the server issues.

Drop-hacking was nearly eradicated.
